original_title: What Places of Heaven, What Planets Directed, How Long the Effects? or, The General Accidents of the World
overview: In this film of textual quotations, words, like images, appear and dissipate, the spectator being unable to apprehend them. They are thus treated as matter and light, as a unit of time and at the same time of weight.
title: What Places of Heaven, What Planets Directed, How Long the Effects? or, The General Accidents of the World
